mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PostPhoto (upload_file_name, store_file_name, save_folder, post_id) VALUES (#{uploadFileName}, #{storeFileName}, #{saveFolder}, #{postId})
INSERT INTO Profile (user_id, upload_file_name, store_file_name, save_folder) VALUES (#{userId}, #{photo.uploadFileName}, #{photo.storeFileName}, #{photo.saveFolder})
mapper.update: UPDATE PostPhoto SET upload_file_name=#{uploadFileName}, store_file_name=#{storeFileName}, save_folder=#{saveFolder} WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE Profile SET upload_file_name=#{photo.uploadFileName}, store_file_name=#{photo.StoreFileName}, save_folder=#{photo.saveFolder} WHERE id=#{photo.id} AND user_id=#{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT photo_id FROM PostPhoto WHERE id=#{id} AND upload_file_name=#{uploadFileName} AND store_file_name=#{storeFileName} AND save_folder=#{saveFolder}
